resources.string: Look at your body size to see if itâ€™s small, medium, or full. According to Ayurveda, each dosha is associated with a different body type.
Dietary planning may be done at several different levels. It may refer to an individual planning a meal and making relevant food purchases.
Eat a well-balanced, low-fat diet with lots of fruits, vegetables and whole grains. Choose a diet that\'s low in saturated fat and cholesterol, and moderate in sugar, salt and total fat.
